t: Amazon.com: Lightfoot! [LP record]: CDs & Vinyl
s: It's Gordon Lightfoot...what can I say? He's absolutely perfect! However, the album is a 1988 remake of the original recording so does not have several songs - a detail not disclosed when I ordered it. I am still seeking the original recording. Not happy with Amazon or the seller on this one.

t: Lightfoot, Gordon - Songbook - Amazon.com Music
s: Stoic, weathered, and hard-working, Lightfoot practices a husky brand of folk music that's as timeless as the Canadian landscape that seems to loom above his most memorable melodies. This overdue four-disc retrospective stretches all the way back to 1962, when the Ontario-born performer tried to make it in Nashville, up to 1998; 16 previously unreleased tracks and another 17 previously available only on vinyl ...

t: Amazon.com: The Best of Gordon Lightfoot: CDs & Vinyl
s: How can you not like Gordon Lightfoot. Easy listening music which is so much more enjoyable than today's music.

t: Gordon Lightfoot - The United Artists Collection - Amazon.com Music
s: The acolytes sung of Gordon Lightfoot are of the highest calibre. Bob Dylan, with whom he shared a manager at the time of these recordings, has called him his favourite composer (and no praise could be higher coming from a doyen of popular music). He and Joni Mitchell share the distinctions of being Canada’s son and daughter of song writing, and both were helped early in their careers by the legendary folk singer and television host Oscar Brand...
